# About Me
My name is Patrick Ross, and I'm currently a sophomore at Mansfield University. I'm currently pursuing a bachelor's degree in Computer Science. 

## Team Work
I'm currently apart of a team for my Business Programming Concepts I course. Here's a link to our team website [https://mansfieldteam2.github.io/Portfolio/](https://mansfieldteam2.github.io/Portfolio/)
